price: Fir'awn, warri isa duraatiifi (gandoonni) gombifamtoonnis diliidhaan dhufan.
arabic: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wajāa fir'ʿawnu waman qablahu wal-mu'tafikātu bil-khāṭi-ati
